m_szDocTitle: High Functioning Supercapacitor Suitable For Electric Cars Developed In Korea | Be Korea-savvy
m_szDocSumamry: by Korea Bizwire in First Move , Most Viewed , Nano & Semiconductor , Science , Top News with 0 Comments The structure is claimed to reduce noise propagation between floors by up to 30 percent.(image credit: Kobiz Media) SEOUL, Feb. 15 (Korea Bizwire) – A research team at the Korea Institute for Basic Science (KIBS) has developed a new type of supercapacitor that can store as much energy as typical commercialized lithium-ion batteries. Supercapacitors are high-capacity electrochemical capacitors, which can store 10 to 100 times more energy than electrolytic capacitors. The synthesis of superca
